sections.title: Scar Seeker (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Scar Seeker class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Enduring Scar (Su) (Scar Seeker)
sections.description: Grants supernatural scars that can be activated a limited number of times per day, providing various effects like weapon enhancement, healing enhancement, damage sharing, and protective abilities. New scars are gained every 2 levels with different prerequisites and upgrade options.

sections.title: Painful Purification (Su) (Scar Seeker)
sections.description: Allows activation of enduring scar abilities beyond daily limits by taking 1 point of damage per Hit Die, which can only be healed by a full night's rest. This damage cannot be reduced, ignored, or redirected.

sections.title: Lay on Hands (Su) (Scar Seeker)
sections.description: Functions as the paladin lay on hands ability starting at 2nd level. Class levels stack with other classes that grant lay on hands for determining the ability's effectiveness.

sections.title: Smite Evil (Su) (Scar Seeker)
sections.description: Functions like paladin smite evil but with effective paladin level equal to class level minus 3 (minimum 1). Class levels stack with other smite evil granting classes, with additional uses gained at 8th level.

sections.title: Sanguine Sacrifice (Su) (Scar Seeker)
sections.description: Grants a stacking +1 morale bonus on attack rolls, skill checks, ability checks, and saving throws for 1 hour when using painful purification. Maximum bonus equals one-third class level.

sections.title: True Martyr (Su) (Scar Seeker)
sections.description: As an immediate action, absorbs half the damage from a single effect affecting all allies within 60 feet, and if this kills the scar seeker, creates a monadic deva that fights for 1 minute. Usable once per week.
